name: haggler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who argues about a price or about the conditions of an agreement in an attempt to make it better for themselves : Every good haggler knows you should research prices for the product you want to buy. He was a well-known haggler in local junk shops. Related word
haggle
More examplesFewer examplesShe introduced me to antiques dealers and bargained on my behalf, which was great because I am a terrible haggler.The embarrassment when asking for a discount is enough to deter many would-be hagglers.I learnt that if you don't haggle, your bill could be 10 percent higher than that of a competent haggler. All but the most determined and confident hagglers usually end up feeling they have been taken advantage of by the car salesperson and have paid too much.
